video_utils package¶

Submodules¶

video_utils.VideoCard module¶

class video_utils.VideoCard.VideoCard(specs: video_utils.VideoCard.VideoReadSpecs = VideoReadSpecs(device='/dev/video0', height=720, width=1280))[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to interact with a web-camera or other recording device.

frame_loader() → None[source]¶

Code executed by the video-capture-thread. Constantly examine the video from the card and store it locally.

Returns:

None

most_recent_frame() → None[source]¶

Get the most recently captured frame from the video capture device. Used to view or record the contents of the video stream.

Returns:

bytes: binary image as captured by the video capture device.

start_viewing() → None[source]¶

Start monitoring this device and storing the video images locally. This will start a thread devoted to the process and then return.

Returns:

None

stop_viewing() → None[source]¶

Complete the monitoring of video capture device.

Returns:

None

Module contents¶

Classes to capture and record video data supplied via a video input device.

video_utils.combine_video_and_audio(video_file: str, audio_file: str, resulting_file: str) → None[source]¶

Routine to combine a video file (with no audio) and an audio file into a single file using the H.265 codec creating a that is as small as possible without losing its quality.
